extendedInfo.description: Report It! is a real time mobile civic engagement platform for Escondido residents. Report It! provides a free and simple way for people to use their smartphone to report community problems such as grafitti or potholes. A picture is worth a thousand words and Report It! makes it a snap. Download it today!Ignore any error messages about AirMail app. Continue to use your app normally by pressing âcancelâ button at AirMail error message.

reviews.title: Needs More!
reviews.comment: I wish we could report more. Escondido is a large dump with yards that are disgusting. We need to report ALL violations to clean up the city! This app also starts on boot and starts itself back up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mostly works (so you should use it)
reviews.comment: This bad app is a \"3\" because my city\'s good response to my reports. Otherwise it would get a \"2-minus.\"   I sent CitySourced a bug list nearly 2 months ago and none have been fixed.  Problems with v1.5.1 include: (a) Map doesn\'t always show up.  (b) If you manually type an address because the map is acting up, the app ignores the typed-in address and uses whatever crazy location the map thinks it is at.  In my case, this meant a wrong city, so my report was never seen by my city.  (c) Boxes disappear.  (d) I can\'t turn my phone sideways to use a wider keyboard.  (e) When I click on Reports...List View...and select one of my reports, it shows the correct photo.  When I click on the photo, it shows the photo of another report I\'ve submitted.  (f) You get alerts when a case is closed. Click on the alert and it disappears without telling you which case closed.  (g) The app says you\'re limited to 3 attached photos per report, yet I can attach 4.  I would like more than 4 in some cases.  (h) It takes much to many clicks to attach multiple photos to a report. - - - - - If you are a city, you want people using the app and I can see people not using this app because of its faults.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Have now reported 5 instances of graffiti, and so far 4 have been resolved. htc Rezound
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Even with GPS on and located. Waste of tax dollars!

reviews.comment: You need to turn your gps on your phone for it to load

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This is what every city needs!
